frameStep: The assumption I'm making is that AI will predominantly optimize and enhance the efficiency of energy systems. recursiveStep: Exploring the recursive lens further, we can ask: How can AI's role in democratizing energy access be measured and evaluated over time to ensure it truly benefits underserved communities?
